newsitem.title: ITALY: Milan bourse opening further delayed to 1020 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Milan bourse opening further delayed to 1020 GMT.

text.p: The opening time of the Italian stock market in Milan was further delayed until 1020 GMT due to technical problems in the transmission of information, the Bourse Council said on Friday.

The normal opening time of the Milan bourse is 0900 GMT but the start had been earlier delayed until 0950 GMT, before being further delayed until 1020 GMT. The bourse will close as normal at 1600 GMT.
